author: lhazlewood
msg: Began preparing for new Factory style methods - added SessionManager#createSession(Map) and adjusted SessionFactory to support this.  Current behavior is retained, just implemented in a different way.  Added AuthorizingRealm#getAvailablePrincipal utility method to eliminate duplicate code used across many realms.  Cleaned up much JavaDoc.

author: jaz
msg: 1. re-implemented google checkout (send shopping cart) using the java API
3. finished implementation of cancel, capture and ship notifications (Order Processing API to Google)
5. added place holders for other notification messages
6. added controller event for processing incoming messages (/googlecheckout/control/handleMessage)
7. added new entity to map shipping methods to support w/ google and link them to internal shipping methods
8. added ecas to prevent certain order changes which cannot be support by Google (adding items, changng quanities)

author: psteitz
msg: Fixed xml to work with maven 2 changes plugin.
